00008 // Description:
00009 // Horizontal stacked layout.
00010 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00011 
00012 #include <limits>
00013 #include <complex>
00014 
00015 namespace HStackedLayout
00016 {
00017     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018     // Function: updateItemMove()
00019     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020     template <class T>
00021     void updateItemMove(QList<T*>& items, T* item, qreal minX, qreal spacing)
00022     {
00023         using DiagramUtil::clampCeil;
00024 
00025         // Move the item to the last position (this simplifies the for loop).
00026         items.removeAt(items.indexOf(item));
00027         items.append(item);
00028         
00029         // Determine the best position for the item (position where the item is closest to
00030         // its resulting stacked position).
00031         qreal refX = item->pos().x() + item->boundingRect().left();
00032         qreal dist = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00033         qreal x = minX;
00034         int index = 0;
00035 
00036         for (int i = 0; i < items.size(); ++i)
00037         {
00038             qreal newDist = std::fabs(x - refX);
00039 
00040             // We can stop when the distance begins to grow.
00041             if (newDist > dist)
00042             {
00043                 break;
00044             }
00045 
00046             dist = newDist;
00047             index = i;
00048 
00049             // Otherwise increment the bookkeeping x.
00050             x += clampCeil(items.at(index)->boundingRect().width(), GridSize) + spacing;
00051         }
00052 
00053         // Change the item's position in the list.
00054         items.removeAt(items.indexOf(item));
00055         items.insert(index, item);
00056 
00057         // Move the other columns accordingly.
00058         x = minX;
00059 
00060         for (int i = 0; i < items.size(); ++i)
00061         {
00062             if (i != index)
00063             {
00064                 items.at(i)->setX(x + clampCeil(-items.at(i)->boundingRect().left(), GridSize));
00065             }
00066 
00067             x += clampCeil(items.at(i)->boundingRect().width(), GridSize) + spacing;
00068         }
00069     }
00070 
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     // Function: setItemPos()
00073     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074     template <class T>
00075     void setItemPos(QList<T*> const& items, T* item, qreal y, qreal minX, qreal spacing)
00076     {
00077         using DiagramUtil::clampCeil;
00078 
00079         int index = items.indexOf(item);
00080         qreal x = minX;
00081 
00082         for (int i = 0; i < index; ++i)
00083         {
00084             x += clampCeil(items.at(i)->boundingRect().width(), GridSize) + spacing;
00085         }
00086 
00087         item->setPos(x + clampCeil(-item->boundingRect().left(), GridSize), y);
00088     }
00089 
00090     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091     // Function: updateItemPositions()
00092     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093     template <class T>
00094     void updateItemPositions(QList<T*>& items, qreal y, qreal minX, qreal spacing)
00095     {
00096         using DiagramUtil::clampCeil;
00097 
00098         qreal x = minX;
00099 
00100         for (int i = 0; i < items.size(); ++i)
00101         {
00102             items.at(i)->setPos(x + clampCeil(-items.at(i)->boundingRect().left(), GridSize), y);
00103             x += clampCeil(items.at(i)->boundingRect().width(), GridSize) + spacing;
00104         }
00105     }
00106 }
